website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice in a cast iron skillet that has the added bonus of a silicone handle cover.
pros: Users report that this is a good quality skillet, versatile enough for everyday use
It also stands out for being easy to clean and including a silicone handle cover to make it easy to transport
cons: Some users experienced occasional issues with this pan, such as the finish being too rough and having food stick to the surface

customer_reviews.title: Don't wash
customer_reviews.text: excellent pan. For those who complain about rust etc.. My Brother used to be a cook. His advice, never wash the pan. when done wipe clean and spray oil on the pan, If there's stuff stuck to it heat pan on hi and them pour small amount of water on it and wipe clean. Put spray oil on it before storing. Before using it heat it up good to kill any germs.Over time it will build up a smooth nonstick coating. Just keep it well oiled when using. I use spray oil or butter when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Daiv

customer_reviews.title: Great pan, seasoning still needed!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this pan...now that we've seasoned it. You definitely can't pull it out of the box and expect to cook eggs on it. Pretty sure we've oiled/baked this thing about 10 times now and it's at a good place. We're first time cast iron users to it took a little getting used to but now we love it!.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet/Silicone handle is useless
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for about a week now and am loving it. I have never owned or used a cast iron skillet before and I dont know why havent. These things are robust and work great. I only have one slight issue that is driving me a bit crazy and that is the silicone handle cover goes on so loose that it is nearly pointless to have. It is uncomfortable to use and just feels like an after thought. This is one thing that can and should be redesigned. Otherwise great product and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Shalini

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective. The pan leaked. We tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective. The pan leaked. We tried with water first and saw water dripping. If we had used oil it would have resulted in disaster. Returning this defective item. I even took a video of the leak
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to season
customer_reviews.text: Easy to season. I know it says Pre-Seasoned but I seasoned it again before I used it. Solid. Love the rubber handle (removable). Cooked some bacon, added pasta and Alfredo sauce then topped with shrimp and cheese and stuck it in the oven to finish it off. It was yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a Broken Handle
customer_reviews.text: I should've listened to the reviews and gone with the Lodge pan. As others have said, the handle came broken/cracked cleanly through on one side. Both the inner and outer boxes were undamaged upon receipt, leading me to believe it was packaged already broken. Don't waste your time, simply get the better pan the first time around. Luckily Amazon has a good return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting too much from a $25.00 pan but I love this pan! I seasoned it right away and used it for the first time to make risotto...delicious! I can't believe what a difference a cast iron pan makes. I bought one of those copper color pans a couple years ago bc I got suckered by the infomercial...as convenient and non-stick as it is, it's terrible for cooking. This pan is fantastic...heat spreads so evenly and it's very heavy, great quality. And the silicon removable grip helps so much. I would absolutely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking. Heavy skillet.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a cast iron skillet before. I read the instruction that came with the skillet. Not too difficult. I cooked a steak as per instructions. Steak was great. I’m glad I got the skillet with the hot handle cover. My biggest problem is how to clean it.....instructions say one thing Internet has other ways. I just wiped it clean. That seemed to work. Looking forward to trying other food. I live in Phoenix so I was looking for a way to not go outside and bbq in over 100 degrees. It worked.
customer_reviews.author: elise abouaf

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Reliable Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, sturdy pan. It comes with some seasoning but be prepared to break it in for a few months and reseason it a few times before it behaves like it really should. That's about what you should expect from any cast iron pan! I've thoroughly seasoned it once and cooked with oil on it several times and it's behaving pretty well! A word of caution: I suggest you try picking up a 12" cast iron pan before you choose this size. It's pretty heavy and I can't easily move it one handed. With the rubber handle holder and a potholder, it's ok to move with both hands!
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: New to Cast Iron
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to cast iron cookware, but heard good things and wanted to try it out. First time and only time (so far) cooking on it I fried hamburger. Heated up well, cooked great. I realize the seasoning process will take several more cooking sessions, and until then cleaning might not be so easy. I also ordered Cast Iron Oil and Cast Iron Soap and glad I did as it made the cleaning process a lot easier. So far seems like a great quality product and I'm looking forward to using it again! P.S. The silicone hot handle cover that came with it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Maeghan

customer_reviews.title: My recommendation!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy on my part! I do not normally participate in buying cooking materials online, I definitely prefer to see, feel, & handle the products. However I’m very pleased and super excited to cook for my friends and family with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice skillet Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The inside bottom was ae 150 bit rough, so I sanded it down lightly with some 150 sand paper so it was smooth to the touch. washed it then wiped some olive oil on the inside. heated it up on med heat till it started smoking. then let it cool and washed it. then I coated it with bacon grease an put it in the oven at 375 for 30min. next day I cooked up some bacon with a little extra grease and the bacon never stuck to the pan. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Royce Wells

customer_reviews.title: the script on the underside of the pan transfers nicely into the scalp of your intended victim
customer_reviews.text: This pan is just what you need when you really want to crack someone over the skull. As an added bonus, the script on the underside of the pan transfers nicely into the scalp of your intended victim, especially after being brought up to temperature. Ive used traditional pans in the past and they just don't transfer the sort of impact of a cast iron pan!
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: KEEP YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst item I have ever bought on amazon. This thing is starting to rust I haven’t even had the pan for a month and it’s like this. Plus foods stick to it. I’m sorry but I’m not putting my families health on the line over a cast iron skillet. So once I send this back I’m not buying anything else from this company
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for home cooking
customer_reviews.text: The pan arrived today and I tried it right after i open the box, the product come with good wrapping and I use it to cook Pad thai, my favorite thai dish, and it came out so good. the noodles are not stick together and stuck on the pan. The heat that went thru the pan is very smooth and heat up the food real good. After cleaning just don't forget to add some oil to the pan for a longer product lift. Really worth my 15 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised at the roughness of the bottom of pan. My other cast iron isn't that way. I seasoned it with flax oil after reading that that was the best oil to use and sure enough, it gave a beautiful buildup of seasoning along with making it smoother. Other than that, I am very pleased with my pan and would certainly order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Cookware Is Different
customer_reviews.text: The fry pan is different and I'll have to get used to cooking in it. This one heats up very fast and stays hot so I have to adjust to the new cooking method. I think it will last for generations. I wish I had my mom's old pan cause it was smoother after decades of use. Who knew these pans increase in value when they are used. I sure miss my mom's pan.
customer_reviews.author: David M Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: They need to do a better job on checking quality before shipping out. First one had a small hole in the side. Did an exchange, the second one came very fast but it had a small crack. Debated on keeping it anyways, but was worried the crack would get worse. The shipping box was not damaged on either of the two. So I returned it. The pan has a nice heavy weight to it, the company needs to inspect the pans first.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Grames

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come ready to use!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine for the money, but you DEFINITELY need to season the skillet a few times if you want any type of non stick and decent ability to cook without major sticking!! Take the time to do several rounds of seasoning yourself before you try to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Addy E.

customer_reviews.title: Awful receipt of item. Broken.
customer_reviews.text: Showed up with a busted off handle and had clearly been returned once before. The broken handle was wrapped in plastic lasting inside the pan.
customer_reviews.author: mjfisch

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but it literally smelled like poop when I opened it up. I cleaned it a couple times and it is fine. The smell disappeared but was quite off-putting when we first received it. Other than that, it works great - the silicone handle that came with it is nice as well and prevents me from burning my hands
customer_reviews.author: Carolin M

customer_reviews.title: Not level
customer_reviews.text: This skillet appears to have a convex surface. The oil always flows to the outside while the center remains dry. Very irritating. Try to save a few bucks and this is what you get. Should have stuck with Lodge.
customer_reviews.author: Patriotvnvet

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older non stick frying pan. Had a brunch with 8 people and used both the old pan and this new cast iron one and found the cast iron pan did a great job with not sticking and i think the french toast came out better on the cast iron pan.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait till I've used this pan for a few months before writing my review. I wasn't sure about purchasing this cast iron skillet at first, but I'm glad I did! As long as you don't use soap on the pan, it will last a lifetime! Hot water and a scouring pad is all you need to keep it clean! Dry it and put a little oil in the pan afterwards! It's starting to build up a great non-stick layer on it! Well worth the money! If someone leaves a negative review.... They need to stick with ordering out! Great Skillet!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pre-seasoned pan
customer_reviews.text: When we recieved the pan it is somewhat pre seasoned so it doesn't smell horrible thank God. We used some olive oil and seasoned it again for about 3 hours and it's been perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Reg927

customer_reviews.title: Once You Go Here You Won’t Go Back
customer_reviews.text: I love this cast iron pan. Not that I’m used to ranking pans in our kitchen, but this one is awesome. It took several times to season before we could use it, but the time and effort were worth it! The handle cover is nice and helpful too. If your looking for a cast iron pan, this is a great one - and I bet you won’t go back to “non-stick” pans after you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Darbonne

customer_reviews.title: Love my new cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions and seasoned it like you are supposed to. My husband fried some chicken and shrimp in it they came out great. Easy clean. Just follow the directions and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Versatility and learning!
customer_reviews.text: Really like it and must learn how to use it and simplify cleaning. It is heavy for my wife but okay for me. I wish I had bought an assist silicone handle for the opposite of the regular handle. Still learning, but like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Pekarek Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Made steak with it last night. It needs a little more seasoning still, but the steaks turned out terrific. We added a little water and boiled it to clean it, then ended up making some pretty delicious gravy. Poured that off, then we boiled it again and it rinsed out just fine. Oiled it again and stored it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a flat cooking surface
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's cast iron. Of course it's durable and as easy to clean and maintain as any other one out there. What I didn't like is that it is essentially convex...raised in the middle. Oil runs to the edges so if you need to fry something or if you want to bake in it it will have a dimple. I have seen the other brand names like Lodge and they are not like this. Also watched how they are made...with sand molds so don't understand how they can get this so wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This pan worked great first time
customer_reviews.text: This pan worked great first time. It seems to be adequately seasoned out of the box and gets noticeably better with each use. I put a little olive oil in it and started cooking. It sautéed these veggies beautifully. It's thick and seems to retain heat evenly. It is heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Skillet Review
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this addition to our cookware. Do your due diligence prior to owning one. Seasoning, cleaning...etc. That said, this skillet has been great so far and we are very happy with this purchase. The silicone handle cover is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used an iron skillet before purchasing this one. And I never dreamed doing so would make such a difference in how my food tastes. It truly is the difference between just heating my food really cooking it!
customer_reviews.author: CHP WebShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I’ve had it less than a week and have used 3 times already. The silicon handle was a bonus. Most other pans you had to purchase it separate. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coles

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for the price high quality preseasoning is good ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pan for the price high quality preseasoning is good but it will definitely break in more as you use it. It’s a solid cast iron pan what more can you say? I’d definitely buy it again. I’m using these to get away from the Teflon and ceramic ones that just keep chipping up
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real pleased with purchase especially since some other cast iron skillets ...
customer_reviews.text: Preseasoned pan worked perfectly right out of the box. The pan is substantial and takes a while to reach operating temperature. Once at temperature, cooks very well. Real pleased with purchase especially since some other cast iron skillets cost a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: James Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I really like this pan and I use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pan and I use it for everything. It's big enough for me to saute eggs on one side and veggies on the other. The only downside, which is why I gave it only 4 stars, is because the silicone handle wrap is awkwardly large. It just doesn't fit the handle well. The grip on the opposite side of the handle is great, though.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal K.

customer_reviews.title: Handle broken!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my skillet today and the picture above is how it was when I removed it from the box. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Frazier

customer_reviews.title: I followed the advice of others here to re-season it after it arrived and using it has been a great experience. The pan heats so evenly even on ...
customer_reviews.text: My first cast iron skillet....I followed the advice of others here to re-season it after it arrived and using it has been a great experience. The pan heats so evenly even on my old stove, and the size allows for bigger batches of everything. I'll be buying other pans from this company.
customer_reviews.author: C. Asher

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: It washes so easy because it is seasoned. It is very easy to care for. I have used it many times and it just wipes clean. Then I dry it thoroughly and oil it with olive oil. Love Love Love this pan
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukee Cat Man

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a friend, it was received and the recipient is very happy. A good product for the price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Greyci Lew

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Healthy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I'm on the cusp of being anemic. It's not as easy to clean as other skillets but it's healthier to use. I purchased the cast iron skillet with a scrapper and linked chain to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan, but I hate cleaning it.
customer_reviews.text: Dang I make some good steaks in this thing. It's much bigger than I expected and can cook 2-3 large steaks at once. It's very heavy and durable. I have a little rust around the emblem on the bottom of the pan since I didn't dry the pan very well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice large pan
customer_reviews.text: Very nice large pan. Just what I wanted. It came pre seasoned. I did season it again to get the shine and will do so until I like it the why I want it. I love the handle cover and the other end that make it easier to handle with two hands.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Heiser

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as wedding gifts - baked brownies in them to give the couple a "sweet" start to their married life! They loved the brownies and have the pan for their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: TTOMM

customer_reviews.title: Fine Skillet
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the cast iron skillet for several weeks now. It seems to be a fine cast iron skillet, like the one my mom used for just about forever back in the day. The removable sleeve for the handle is a nice touch that helps when lifting a hot, heavy skillet.
customer_reviews.author: SEG

customer_reviews.title: My wife won't stop using this pan!
customer_reviews.text: After getting this pan, my wife seems to cook everything in it. No teflon to flake off, and it's very useful as a non-stick pan. It also heats very evenly. It is a little heavy, but it cooks evenly and consistently, and isn't hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Adriaan Riet

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. It’s warped. It has one spot that burn while rest of food isn’t even beginning to cook. I thought maybe I could get used to it and modify cooking style but it’s impossible! Don’t buy it. I should have gone with the American made Lodge. I have a smaller Lodge and it cooks great...I shouldn’t have tried to save a few bucks. Now, I’m spending more than if I’d just ordered the Lodge
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love this skillet
customer_reviews.text: Finally getting around to replace the skillets my grandmother gave me years ago since mine got lost when moving. This is a very nice skillet, very sturdy and I love the silicone handle (easier to handle instead of using an oven mitt). It's not as heavy duty as my old skillet but still sturdy. Be sure to keep it seasoned.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: It's big a bit heavy bit I'm glad I have one again. Everyone! Your not using the plastic gripper properly, mine is still in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: DIL loves it and appreciates cast iron pans. She loves the insulated handle cover too!
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had one other cast iron pan. It was smaller and I could never get it seasoned right. This one is amazing! I re-seasoned it several times before use based on other reviews and season it about every other time using now. I can't live without it now. Non stick and cooks beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday! I clean it and leave it on the stove! Even came with a silicon handle cover!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Tindall

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your other cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Your cooking doesn’t taste as good with other pans. Mom and Grandma were right. A skillet beats them all. Glad I got this and it was a lightning deal! An added feature is that your arms and forearms are toned as you go.
customer_reviews.author: ronvin

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and use all the time, if you complain about this skillet, your not a cook!
customer_reviews.author: Alan D. Vetterick

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan I always use it same with my wife. Wish I bought sooner
customer_reviews.author: chris wolf

customer_reviews.title: Not like Grandma's
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was very happy with the skillet. However, I noticed the center part of the skillet is losing its color (fading to silver) and my food has black flakes in it from the flaking of the pan --- and no, it is not pepper, but looks like pepper. I have seasoned it several times and now believe the it may not be a real cast iron skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! I seasoned it again after buying it even though comes pre seasoned and nothing sticks to it ever. I just use hot water to clean it. Have baked pizza in it, made a roast in it, several breakfast bakes, great pan for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good heavy weight and seems a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described and arrived very quick. Not used it yet but have seasoned it and no issues there. It’s a good heavy weight and seems a great purchase. Will update after a few uses
customer_reviews.author: Stephen darling

customer_reviews.title: A must have in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This cast iron skillet reminds me so much of my mom's long lasting cookware. I just had to get one again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Pan
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good pan. I would recommend it but there is just something that I don't like enough for 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love cast iron cooking better then regular pans the food taste better and easy to clean if you clean it correctly it will last
customer_reviews.author: Schnoll007

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great cast iron pan. Once I got the hang of seasoning it properly, clean up is easier.
customer_reviews.author: sreyes

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooking! Easy to clean. Still as of yet need to re-season it. Will need to properly learn this.
customer_reviews.author: A.Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Serves me in many meals!
customer_reviews.text: Great for Dutch baby pancakes, corn bread, single layer cakes, baked beans, stew and pot pie. Always beware of the heat!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice M Adelphia

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the skillet is warped up in the center and causes any oil to run to the edges even if the skillet is level. Other than that, it functions. The price was good but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: It's a housewarming gift for someone who will not need it for at least 6 months. Couldn't beat that price. You know what they say, "if you don't buy it when you see it, it will be gone". So I got it! 😉
customer_reviews.author: cap3

customer_reviews.title: Great Value...but definitely needs to be seasoned
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the monet, however you will DEFINITELY need to season it at least Twice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Domyan

customer_reviews.title: I love to cook and have a John Wayne cast iron ...
customer_reviews.text: I love to cook and have a John Wayne cast iron cook book that I got as a gift. Now I can us it. I have made one recipe and the skillet was great. The blueberry pot pie is next.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The skillet is not nearly as nice as the one I already had
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this skillet. The handle doesn"t hold heat well. The skillet is not nearly as nice as the one I already had. I still use it but not as often as my other cast iron skillet. There is a difference in the cooking and how it heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love love thi frying pan. My meat never tasted so good! I love that it's preseasoned. I love having the silicone handle cover too - so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ccc

customer_reviews.title: Not quality cast iron, stick with lodge!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I loved it and a few months in I'm ready to pitch it! The coating is flaking off and when I clean it it's worse. I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing like cast iron!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the skillet, I browned some lean ground beef. It stuck to the pan and was hard to clean. I should have had the sense to use perhaps a tablespoon of olive oil. Last night, I made a skillet Shepherds Pie, browning the beef with a bit of olive oil, and the skillet performed brilliantly! It went from the stove top to oven, didn't stick at all, and cleanup was a breeze (following the manufacturers recommendations)! I easily give this skillet 5 stars and I highly recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: James Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Great for our camping trip, first time owning a cast iron. I would recommend you looking up how to care for one if you are not sure. Really great would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and Weight, like that it is preseasoned and can get cooking right away. Wonderful steaks!
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not pre-seasoned
customer_reviews.text: So not pre-seasoned at all. The first time I used it I cooked on low heat as instructed and everything stuck to the pan. Not pleased
customer_reviews.author: H. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: They are well worth it toget one
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it so much I brought my daughter-in-law one it’s a great pan and easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Charlie F.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This came 2 days BEFORE I expected it! The quality is wonderful! It's a perfect addition to anyone's cookware collection. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Better than expected. Before I used it the first time, I did season it even though it comes pre seasoned.
customer_reviews.author: bobdon1611

customer_reviews.title: Nice, BIG Iron Skillet !!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Iron Skillet... But 12 inches makes for a very big and heavy pan... If you are cooking for 6-8 people it will be great... But for only 2-4 people I would recommend a 10 inch skillet... Wishing it was smaller is the only reason for not giving 5 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Todd

customer_reviews.title: Everything tastes so much better!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cast iron skillet, it changed my life. Everything tastes so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: Well, haven’t used it yet, but it’s a cast-iron skillet, so little room for disappointment. RTF
customer_reviews.author: randy fliehman

customer_reviews.title: Made in China !
customer_reviews.text: Works good out of the box. Surprised at how THIN the cast iron is, NOT GOOD ! Quality cast iron, has MASS, not this pan ! I will keep skillet, but will go with American made, ONLY ! I had planed to grind bottom smooth, but fear going through !
customer_reviews.author: BillBill

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite thing to clean around
customer_reviews.text: Meh... It works but has a huge logo on the bottom. Not my favorite thing to clean around.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works like any iron skillet. Dont ever use the rubber handle
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON COLEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for stovetop
customer_reviews.text: I love this, follow recommended instructions on care no problem with this skillet
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hill

customer_reviews.title: Stove top to oven
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I enjoy cooking fish in this pan for more favor. Great for beginners. Start on top of the stove and finish in the oven

customer_reviews.title: Rubber handle not tight enough
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the rubber handle needs improvement. It does not help to hold the pan steady.

customer_reviews.title: I love the material this is made of
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this product yet (hence the 4 starts), but man it's so heavy I am actually doubting whether I use if for cooking or as a weapon for self-defense, you never know! I must admit it is a neat piece, I love the material this is nicely made of!

customer_reviews.text: Love it; just know it is heavy so don't expect to pick it up with one hand to drain oil or anything else.
